about_the_game:
One of the failed experiments of the royal magician. An example of how a crazy genius with unlimited money never bodes for anything good. Once a pile of stones, today a dangerous pile of stones. Harder and more durable than the swords of the best royal knights. It has a strength of 420 doll oxen. Breaking free from bondage, he seeks the meaning of life. Will our golem know what humanity is?

This product is an addition content to BeatMe! It contains one playable character with unique skills and playstyle.

Explore new posibilities, with new characters in this lovely party brawler!
